title: Revolutionary Road - final sentences of paragraphs

content.prompt: The last sentences in paragraphs 2, 3, and 4 are best understood to

choices.label: humorously implicate the reader in a belief
gently mock a character’s sense of security
enthusiastically celebrate the beauty of the world

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
